review: It's a whole new world of entertainment!
author: Eric Stern

review: Thank you for making the Fire TV Stick available with the Sling TV promotion.  My landlord would not allow me to have cable and internet installed to the townhouse I'm renting.  I found a way to get internet, but still didn't have cable.  The Fire TV Stick was the answer and works extremely well.  Hook up was a breeze.  My plan is to get all things amazon when it come to technology.  Good quality products.  Thanks again!!
author: V. Driskill

review: Still trying to find out what different programs will cost me.  What is the best program to get national news?Is there anything that's free?You need better and more instructions within the package.Not as clear as it should be.
author: Len

review: Very easy to install.  The full length power cord was very helpful.  We were up and running in about 5 minutes.  Make sure you have sufficient available HDMI ports on your TV if its a TV install.  Remote is nice and compact and easy to use.
author: Michael OConnor

review: As good as expected. Don't know why I waited so long.
author: PB Nyren

review: I did not find it as friendly as Roku and returned it.
author: Not Maven "not maven"

review: Would have given 5 stars, but you need to have a cable subscription for a lot of channels.  That kind of defeats the whole idea of the product.
author: Steve Davis

review: We love the fire stick should have got one a long time ago. Don't like we have to pay for some movies though.
author: Bonnie6

review: Hardest part was plugging in the hdmi cord with TV on wall.works like a charm. I would highly recommend.
author: James Andrew Webb
